Class ec.meta.InvocationTargetException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----ec.meta.InvocationTargetException
public class InvocationTargetException
extends Exception
This exception is thrown when an invoke() results in the callee throwing an exception. It wraps an exception representing the particular problem.

InvocationTargetException(Throwable)
Construct a InvocationTargetException.

getException()
Get the wrapped exception.

InvocationTargetException 
 public InvocationTargetException(Throwable t)
Construct a InvocationTargetException.

Parameters:
t - the wrapped exception

getException 
 public Throwable getException()
Get the wrapped exception.

Returns:
the wrapped exception
